translations: n.诡计；（赛车道上的）双急转弯，S形弯道，急转弯弯道

sentences.sentence: The track has a mixture of different types of corners and a few chicanes and is quite challenging for the drivers.
sentences.translation: 这条赛道混合了不同的弯道类型和一些减速弯，对于车手来说非常有挑战性。

sentences.sentence: Our car has good straight-line speed, but the chicanes and high-speed corners will make this race another challenge for us.
sentences.translation: 我们的赛车在直道上的速度很棒，不过减速弯和高速弯道会使这场比赛成为我们的另外一次挑战。

sentences.sentence: The chicanes at three hairpin are very high. Good racing drivers will have accident with their good racing car, not to say you green hand with such bad car.
sentences.translation: 三连发夹弯弯度很高，赛车好手开着他们的赛车都会出车祸，何况你这个菜鸟开这台烂车啊？
